Menu

Brand Guidelines

How to use our logo, colors, icons, creating visual hierarchy, oh my!

Logo

Vector General Use

Logo Rules

Spacing

Giving our logo room to breathe allows it to separate itself from the content so our identity remains clear and uncluttered. The rule of thumb to follow is to use the width of our symbol as a unit of measure for the space needed.

Colors and Proportions

Our logo should always be used a consistent manner. Deviating from the established colors should never be done unless you are setting the logo in all black or white.

Typography

Museo Sans/Rounded are our fonts of choice. They a geometric, open and casual. For versatility, we're including several weights. Body copy should remain at the default 300 weight unless emphasis is needed. Buttons are always 700. Headlines will typically use the 100 or 900 weights.

You Won't Believe This One Weird Trick for a Flat Belly!

If You Can Watch This And Not Feel Disgusted, Then You're Made Of Stone

This What Happens When a Golden Retriever Won't Take No for an Answer

Try Not to Roll Your Eyes When You Hear the Last Sentence

Colors

We've chosen a soft and bright palette that makes us unique in our industry. Service & hospitality jobs rely on personality to be successful. We want to echo that in our products. Modifying these colors is ok! But modify them using SASS' Lighten and Darken functions. ( darken($blue, 15); )

Brand Colors

  • Revolution Green HEX: #C6E979 RGB: 198, 233, 121 PMS: 373 U
  • Shiftgig Green HEX: #8CCC7D RGB: 140, 204, 125 PMS: 359 U
  • Logo Type Green HEX: #666F6E RGB: 102, 111, 1107 PMS: 5477 U

Supporting Colors

  • Blue HEX: #38B0ED RGB: 56, 176, 237 PMS: 298 U
  • Bullpen Orange HEX: #F2B755 RGB: 242, 183, 85 PMS: 1225 U
  • Warning Red HEX: #CD6A74 RGB: 205, 106, 116
  • X Purple HEX: #B58DD6 RGB: 181, 141, 214 PMS: 2577 U
  • Note Yellow HEX: #FBFB9A RGB: 251, 251, 154
  • White HEX: #FFFFFF RGB: 255, 255, 255
  • Light Gray HEX: #F9F9F9 RGB: 249, 249, 249
  • Gray HEX: #E2E2E2 RGB: 226, 226, 226
  • Medium Gray HEX: #959595 RGB: 149, 149, 149
  • Dark Gray HEX: #4A4A4A RGB: 74, 74, 74

Gradients

  • Blue START HEX: #1C95D2 END HEX: #61CAFF TO: top right;
  • Orange START HEX: #FF8E00 END HEX: #F2B755 TO: top right;
  • Green START HEX: #8CCC81 END HEX: #AEF386 TO: top right;
  • Purple START HEX: #502275 END HEX: #B58DD6 TO: top right;
  • Grey START HEX: #1F2122 END HEX: #515151 TO: top right;
